item.description: The Governor of Osun State, Gboyega Oyetola has predicted victory for himself in the Osun State governorship primary election of the All Progressives Congress (APC). Oyetola made the assertion shortly after casting his vote on Saturday at the Ward 1 Boripe polling unit. The Governor who commended the members of the party for their massive turnout urged them all to shun violence and electoral malpractice in the primary election. item.title: APC Fixes Date To Release Zoning Formula Report
item.description: Governor Abubakar Bello of Niger State and acting Chairman of the All Progressives Congress Caretaker/Extraordinary Convention Planning Committee has said the report of the zoning formula has been submitted and adopted. The governor stated that the report of the zoning formula will be released anytime from now, adding that the details of the report would also be made public. Bello added that the zoning report was adopted after it was received from the Zoning Committee led by Governor Abdulrahman Abdulrazaq of Kwara State.

item.title: How Many Siblings Did Donald Cline Sire?
item.description: 'Our Father': How Many Siblings Came From Disgraced Fertility Doctor Donald Cline?By Michelle SteinPublished May 11 2022, 1:41 p.m. ET Source: NetflixOn May 11, 2022, the documentary Our Father dropped on Netflix, effectively horrifying viewers with the story of a fertility doctor who crossed roughly a million lines — and ended up biologically fathering nearly 100 babies. Donald Cline helped families struggling with infertility to conceive children, but he did so by using his own sperm without their knowledge or consent.

item.title: Liverpool Beats Arsenal 2-0 To Secure Slot In FA Cup Fourth Round
item.description: Jurgen Klopp’s side, Liverpool, defeated Arsenal on Sunday in their FA Cup third-round clash at the Emirate Stadium. Despite Mohamed Salah’s absence, the Reds staged a late show and broke Mikel Arteta’s side barrage to seal a place in the FA Cup fourth round. Naija News reports that Klopp’s men took the shine in ending long spells against the Gunners as Arsenal wasted a series of chances to take the lead at the Emirates Stadium.

item.title: Presidential Aspirant, Bala Mohammed, Secretly Buys Bauchi Governorship Form
item.description: The Governor of Bauchi State and Presidential aspirant, Bala Mohammed has reportedly secretly obtained the nomination form for the governorship primary of the Peoples Democratic Party. Mohammed is eligible to contest for reelection in 2023 as he has served as governor of the state for a term. There have been speculations on who will take over from him following his presidential intention. There are claims that the Secretary to the Government of the state, Ibrahim Kashim entered a pact to act as a placeholder for the governor.

The TV-MA animated series Q-Force is what happens when you take super-spies in the LGBTQ+ community and give them some badass missions to prove themselves. You Can't Win 2023 Presidency With A Northern Candidate
item.description: The founder of Ovation Media Group, Dele Momodu, says the opposition Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has a better chance of winning the 2023 presidency if it picks its presidential candidate from the South. In a recent interview, Momodu noted that the opposition party cannot reclaim the Presidency if it fields a Northerner as its presidential candidate in 2023. Momodu stated that the North will never get anybody who is as popular as President Muhammadu Buhari that can conveniently win elections in a long time to come.

item.title: Cassi Davis - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Actress best known for playing Ella Payne on Tyler Perry's House of Payne from 2006 to 2012. She also received parts in numerous other Tyler Perry productions such as Aunt Sarah in Madea's Family Reunion. Before Fame She appeared in the Spike Lee film School Daze in 1988.  Trivia She made an appearance in an episode of Nickelodeon's Kenan and Kel in 1996. Family Life She attended Spelman College in Atlanta, where she majored in music. Associated With She was in the film Daddy's Little Girls with Gabrielle Union.

item.title: Marc Anthony - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Grammy Award-winning Puerto Rican singer who became the top-selling salsa artist in history. He's known for hits like "Vivir Mi Vida," "I Need to Know," "Y Hubo Alguien" and "Vivir Lo Nuestro." As an actor, he's appeared in movies such as Man on Fire, Carlito's Way and Bringing Out the Dead.  Before Fame Born Marco Antonio Muñiz, in honor of Mexican singer Marco Antonio Muñiz, he was raised as the youngest of eight children and worked as a background vocalist for Menudo.

item.title: Mercy Aigbe Speaks On Her New Lover's Relationship With Lanre Gentry
item.description: Popular Nigerian actress, Mercy Aigbe, on Wednesday noted that her estranged husband, Lanre Gentry and her new lover, Kazim Adeoti, also known as Adekaz were never friends. Aigbe disclosed this in a message forwarded to ladies of TVC talk show, Your View, where they discussed her new relationship. The topic of the talk show was, ‘Nollywood actress Mercy Aigbe marries ex-husband’s friend’. Aigbe towards the end of the show reached out to the main show host, Morayo Afolabi-Brown on the phone to react to the topic.

item.title: Mystery Series 'Three Pines' Is Based on Books From Award-Winning Author Louise Penny
item.description: Prime Video's mystery drama 'Three Pines' is loosely based on Louise Penny's Chief Inspector Armand Gamache books, but which ones? Source: Prime VideoA small town located off the beaten path. A string of murdered girls. A reserved, empathetic detective who will stop at nothing to uncover said town's sinister secrets. We've got ourselves the ingredients of a twisty crime novel! Actually, they're the ingredients of a series of novels. New York Times bestselling author Louise Penny is known for her Chief Inspector Armand Gamache books, which follow his diverse and inundating investigations, often set in the fictional Quebec town of Three Pines.

item.title: You Abandoned Us To Herdsmen
item.description: Governor Samuel Ortom of Benue state has told former Vice President Atiku Abubakar that Benue people are not happy with him. Naija News reports that the governor stated this when he hosted the former Vice President in Makurdi, the Benue state capital. He stated that despite the state honouring Atiku with Zege Mule Tiv, one of the highest Chieftaincy titles in Tiv land, the former VP abandoned them when they came under the siege of Fulani herdsmen.

item.title: 2023: Obi Dumped PDP To Pursue Personal Ambition
item.description: Former governor of Jigawa State, Sule Lamido has described the defection of Peter Obi from the Peoples Democratic Party to the Labour Party as a move to achieve personal ambition. Lamido in an interview with Punch claimed that the former Governor of Anambra State abandoned PDP which gave him a greater platform in 2019. Obi was the party’s vice-presidential candidate who ran alongside Atiku Abubakar but was defeated by the All Progressives Congress and its candidate, Muhammadu Buhari.

Naija News recalls that Labour Party on Wednesday released a list of its campaign team, which had 1,234 names, including the army general appointed as a representative of the North-Central. Enenche, had during the heat of the EndSARS massacre claimed that the Instagram live footage of DJ Switch, which showed protesters dying was photoshopped.

item.title: UK Stops Nigerian Students, Others From Bringing Family As Dependents
item.description: Starting from January 2024, Nigeria and other foreign students studying in the United Kingdom (UK) cannot bring their family members to the country as dependents except “under specific circumstances,” Naija News understands. This is as the UK government put in place a new law that aims to bring immigration into the country that stands at around one million down. According to Sky News, under the new rule, the UK will remove the ability for international students to switch out of the student route and into work routes before their studies have been completed to prevent misuse of the visa system.

item.title: Magazeti Ijumaa: Urafiki wa Rais Uhuru na Raila wapata ufa baada ya kuanguka kwa mswada wa serikali
item.description: Magazeti ya Ijumaa Julai 31 yameangazia taarifa kuhusu siasa za Rais Uhuru Kenyatta na kinara wa ODM Raila Odinga haswa baada ya kuanguka kwa mswada wa ugavi mapato. Taarifa zingine ni kuhusu sekta ya elimu baada ya Waziri wa Elimu Profesa George Magoha kutoa mwelekeo wa jinsi wanafunzi watapokea masomo wakiwa nyumbani. Habari Nyingine: Wasafiri kutoka Tanzania kuzuiwa kuingia Kenya 1. Daily Nation Taarifa kuu ya gazeti la Daily Nation ni kuhusu masomo kwa wanafunzi wakati huu ambapo shule zimefungwa kutokana na janga la Covid-19.

item.title: Over 100,000 People Sign Petition For Italy Vs England Replay
item.description: More 100,000 people have signed a change.org petition, demanding that the Euro 2020 final between England and Italy be replayed over perceived bias. Italy were crowned champions of the Euro 2020 competition after thrashing England 3-2 in a penalty shootout. However, there were oppositions and alleged unfairness in the officiating of the final. Naija News reports that the encounter at Wembley Stadium ended 1-1 after 120 minutes, leading to the penalty shootout.

item.title: Sanditons Season 2 Premiere Revealed a Major Characters Offscreen Death (SPOILERS)
item.description: How did Sidney die in ‘Sanditon’? See what became to the character and why Theo James left PBS Masterpiece’s latest Jane Austen adaptation. Source: PBSWarning: Sanditon Season 2 spoilers below! If you heard that Theo James wasn’t returning for the second and third seasons of Sanditon, you may be curious to know how Sidney died in the TV show. The character’s demise was hardly a surprise. After Masterpiece and Britbox ordered a second and third season of the Jane Austen adaptation in 2021 — reversing ITV’s 2019 cancellation of the show — Theo announced his departure in a statement on Masterpiece’s Twitter page.

item.title: Sultan Warns Buhari Over Zaria Clash
item.description: Alhaji Muhammad Sa’ad Abubakar, the Sultan of Sokoto, has warned President Muhammadu Buhari and his government over killing in Zaria, Kaduna state. Over 20 people are reported to have died in the clash, which commenced on December 12 and spread till the next day. Sheik Muhammad Turi, the second-in-command to Zakzaky, and the group’s spokesperson, Ibrahim Usman, were reportedly killed by soldiers on Sunday. Tonight, ABC will host a reunion with most of the past 14 leads on The Bachelorette, from Trista Sutter to Becca Kufrin. item.title: Buhari Off To London For Another Medical Check-Up
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari will on June 25 depart for London, United Kingdom, for a scheduled medical follow-up. Naija News reports that this was made known on Thursday by the Special Adviser to the President on Media and Publicity, Femi Adesina. According to Femi Adesina, President Buhari will return to the country during the second week of July, 2021. “President Muhammadu Buhari will proceed to London, the United Kingdom on Friday, June 25, 2021, for a scheduled medical follow-up.

item.title: Gay Marriage Ban Doesnt Violate Human Rights David Mark
item.description: President of the Senate, David Mark, says the position of the National Assembly to outlaw gay marriage has not infringed on the rights of any citizen. Mark, who made the declaration on Thursday while addressing the Nigerian community in Prague, Czech Republic, also said the position was irreversible. He said, “The law against same-sex marriage is an approval of the wishes of the generality of Nigerians, who are desirous of living within our cultural bounds.

item.title: Remains Of OAU Student, Timothy Adegoke Laid To Rest
item.description: The remains of a murdered student of the Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile Ife, Timothy Adegoke, has been buried amidst tears. Naija News reports that the 37-year-old Master of Business Administration student died under controversial circumstances. It was gathered that the remains of Adegoke were brought to the Eruwa Town Hall in a white casket with hundreds of youths in attendance. The body of the accountant was buried beside the house he built for his parents in the New Eruwa part of Eruwa town.

item.title: Names Of Nominees Submitted To Tinubu For APC Vice Presidential Candidate Revealed
item.description: The names of the nominees earlier submitted to Bola Ahmed Tinubu to pick his vice presidential candidate from have been revealed. Recall that the All Progressives Congress (APC) Presidential candidate, Bola Ahmed Tinubu, had on Sunday announced the former Governor of Borno State, Kashim Shettima, as his running mate for the 2023 general elections. According to Daily Trust, the Planning and Strategy Committee of the Tinubu Campaign Organisation (TCO) recommended eleven names for Tinubu to choose from as his running mate.

item.title: Uganda strongman Yoweri Museveni stopped taking Cocacola in 1965 and he explains why
item.description: - Uganda President Yoweri Museveni has revealed he stopped taking Cocacola products in 1965 - He attributes this to Kenya's KCC milk - Museveni says since the invention of KCC, he has never looked back If you thought Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni's dalliance with Kenya went with the Migingo Island crisis, then you are in for a rude shock. It just started when we thought our relationship with our neighbours had hit rock-bottom.

item.title: Why Reality TV Show Winners Don't Thrive In The Music Industry Iyanya
item.description: Popular Nigerian singer, Iyanya Onoyom Mbuk, also known as Iyanya, has shared his thoughts on the reason most reality TV show winners don’t thrive after winning a music competition. According to Iyanya, most reality TV show stars don’t have the intention of being famous. The singer who was the winner of Project Fame West Africa Season 1 disclosed this in a recent interview with Hip TV. The ‘Kukere’ crooner opined that most winners simply decide to give the show a try and ended up winning.

item.title: Kankara: Abducted Students Will Be Rescued Soon
item.description: The Minister of Defence, Bashir Salihi-Magashi, has said security agents know the whereabouts and movements of the abductors of the students of Government Science Secondary School, Kankara, Katsina State. Salihi-Magashi stated this while leading a federal government delegation to meet with Governor Aminu Masari of Katsina, on Sunday. Recall that unknown gunmen on Friday night had attacked the government school and abducted over 300 students. Speaking during the visit, Salihi-Magashi said it was an easy task for the Nigerian army and police to recover the missing students.

item.title: Why Buni Was Absent At National Headquarters
item.description: The ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) has given the reason the Chairman of the Caretaker/Extra-ordinary Convention Planning Committee (CECPC) and Governor of Yobe State, Mai Mala Buni, was absent at the national headquarters. Naija News reports that Governor Abubakar Sani Bello of Niger State presided over a meeting of the committee held on Monday at the party National Secretariat in Abuja in Buni’s absence. In a chat with newsmen after the meeting, Secretary of the committee, Senator John James Akpanudoedehe, said Buni was absent due to medical reasons.

item.title: Atiku, Soludo Joint Presidential Campaign Posters Flood Abuja
item.description: The 2023 presidential campaign posters bearing the images of former Vice President Atiku Abubakar and that of ex-CBN Governor, Prof Charles Soludo have flooded Abuja, the Federal Capital Territory. The posters which had captions declaring the candidacy of Atiku as a presidential candidate and Soludo as his running mate were seen in various strategic locations in Abuja during the weekend. The posters were seen in Garki, Maitama, Wuse area, and the Airport Road in Abuja.

item.title: Korra Obidi Cheers To Victory As She Finalises Her Divorce From Justin Dean
item.description: American-based Nigerian dancer, Korra Obidi has taken to social media to jubilate as she finalizes her divorce from her husband, Justin Dean. Naija News recalls dancer’s husband, Dean announced their divorce in April, a few days after they welcomed their second daughter together. The mother of two took to her Facebook page on Saturday to rejoice over how the divorce case turned out in court. According to her, the divorce has been finalized and she is a free woman and hopefully moving on for the sake of her children.

Naija News understands that Imo would not vote along with other states who were now voting with their three-man and one-man national delegates.

item.title: Rosa Parks - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Civil rights activist who became known as "The first lady of civil rights" after she was arrested for refusing to give up her seat on a bus in 1955. This act instigated the legendary Montgomery Bus Boycott, which helped end racial segregation on public transit across the country. Before Fame Her school, the Montgomery Industrial School, was burned down twice by racist arsonists. Trivia There are two Rosa Parks days in her honor: Her birthday, February 4th, and the day of her arrest, December 1st.

item.title: How to check your NSSF number online and via SMS in Kenya
item.description: The National Security Social Fund (NSSF) is a Kenyan agency created in 1965 through an Act of Parliament Cap 258 of the Laws of Kenya. The agency collects, safekeeps, responsibly invests, and distributes employees' retirement funds in formal and informal sectors. When you register for this scheme, you get an NSSF number for identification and recordkeeping. Learn how to check your NSSF number online and via SMS today. TABLE OF CONTENTSThe primary objective of NSSF is to provide Kenyans with financial security benefits after retirement or becoming permanently disabled.

item.title: Fuji Singer, Saheed Osupa Bags First Degree From University Of Ibadan
item.description: Fuji singer, Akorede Babatunde Okunola popularly known as Saheed Osupa has bagged his first degree from the University of Ibadan. Naija News understands that the 52-year-old confirmed the development on his official Instagram page on Friday, January 28. King Saheed Osupa as he is also known, shared that he bagged a Bachelors degree in Political Science from the prestigious University. Naija News reports that fans, colleagues in the Yoruba film industry as well as in the music industry have taken to social media to felicitate with the ace Fuji singer.

item.title: Jonathan To Launch 2nd Niger Bridge On Monday
item.description: It has been revealed by President Goodluck Jonathan said on Tuesday in Abuja that he will do the "real ground-breaking" ceremony for the second Niger Bridge in Anambra next Monday. According to the country leader, after all the proper planning and funding has been put in place, he is ready to start the project in earnest. Jonathan promised the great opening ceremony to be held on March 10. It would be recalled that during his previous visit to the state the president pledged to launch the construction before governor-elect of the state, Peter Obi, leaves office on March 17.

item.title: Chelsea Manager Admits Nicolas Jackson Is "Suffering"
item.description: Just like most big-name signings at Chelsea over the years, especially in the last two seasons, Nicolas Jackson has been struggling to establish himself at the club. Historically, Chelsea is known to be unlucky in terms of signing a top 9 and the last top 9 that was consistently productive at the club was retired Didier Drogba who officially bowed out of the West London side in 2015. Since that year, Chelsea have tried so many strikers including Romelu Lukaku, but they have not been lucky enough to land a reliable striker.

item.title: Ekpenyong Slams Wike Over PDP Crisis
item.description: The Senator representing Akwa Ibom North-West, Chris Ekpenyong, has berated Governor Nyesom Wike of Rivers State over the crisis rocking the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). Naija News reports that the Rivers governor is angry over the manner of his loss to former Vice President Atiku Abubakar at the presidential primary and the failure of the former Vice President to pick him as running mate. Governor Wike and his camp have demanded the resignation of the PDP National Chairman, Senator Iyorchia Ayu, in order to resolve the party’s internal wranglings.

item.title: Federal Government Plans Executive Order To Reduce Drug Prices
item.description: The federal government is set to issue an executive order aimed at regulating pharmaceutical prices to make essential medicines more affordable for citizens. The Coordinating Minister of Health, Ali Pate, revealed this information to State House correspondents on Wednesday after the Federal Executive Council (FEC) meeting chaired by President Bola Tinubu at the Presidential Villa. Pate highlighted that the escalating costs of drugs have rendered life-saving commodities inaccessible for many Nigerians.

item.title: Vitu 16 vya kuchekesha wanawake huwafanyia waume zao punde baada ya kuolewa
item.description: Uhusiano wa kimapenzi nyakati nyingi huwa moto moto zinapoanza lakini siku zinapopita, wapenzi wanatulia na kusahau vitu vidogo ila muhimu katika uhusiano. Wachumba wengi walielezea vitu walivyofanya wakati wa fungate katika dau la mapenzi. Baadhi ya wanawake katika kundi la mtandao wa kijamii wa Facebook, Kilimani mums jinsi walivyokuwa wakiwapa waume zao mpaka kadi za kutoa pesa(ATM) kutumia. TUKO.co.ke iliandika orodha ya baadhi ya mambo ambayo hufanywa na wachumba wakati wa fungate.

item.title: Angel Reveals What Female Housemates Of Season 7 Should Avoid
item.description: Former Big Brother Naija ‘Shine Ya Eye’ Housemate Angel Smith has described her stay in the BBNaija show and reunion as a bittersweet experience. In a post shared on her Instagram page, Angel wished the ladies of the next season good luck and warned them to avoid any romantic relationship or entanglement. Angel said all her memories are bittersweet because even though there were hard moments, she enjoyed every moment of the show and the reunion.

item.title: Best Place To Visit For Art, Music And Culture In Lagos
item.description: Editor's Note: Lagos is unarguably the culture melting pot of  Nigeria. But only a few places in the city can boast of the serenity and cultural showcase Freedom Park provides. Located in the city center and since its renovation by Lagos State the former colonial prison has since become a hub for Lagosians. The Naij guest author, Ayodele Olofintuade, a regular at Freedom Park writes about her experience. Story Highlights:

item.title: Carlos Slim - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Mexican business magnate and philanthropist who was named the richest person in the world from 2010 until 2013. Before Fame He taught algebra and linear programming at the National Autonomous University of Mexico. Trivia He owned numerous Mexican companies via his conglomerate Grupo Carso, including one of Latin America's largest mobile-phone carriers América Móvil. Family Life He had six children with his wife Soumaya Domit, to whom he was married for 32 years.

item.title: Jonathan Ordered Me To Make All The Approvals - Dasuki
item.description: The embattled former national security adviser (NSA) Sambo Dasuki has indicted the former president Goodluck Jonathan in the $2 billion arms deal scandal which he, Dasuki, is presently embroiled in. The Nation reports that Dasuki, who may be arraigned before an Abuja high court on Monday, December 14, 2015, confessed to having handed over the N10 billion given to Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) nomination convention delegates to Jonathan’s special assistant on domestic affairs, Waripamowei Dudafa and the aide-de-camp.

item.title: A Member of the Hype House Just Got Kicked out Who Is It?
item.description: Interestingly enough, one member of popular TikTok content creator group the Hype House has recently been kicked out. Here’s what fans should know. Source: Instagram/@petroutvMany young social media users love to keep up with content creator group the Hype House; they’ve amassed millions of followers across social media platforms like TikTok and Instagram. The Hype House has a reputation for pushing social media influencers into superstardom. Article continues below advertisementGetting a chance to be part of the group is certainly a big deal to plenty of folks who are aspiring to reach new levels of fame; it's responsible for the likes of Addison Rae, Chase Hudson, and Alex Warren, but its members are constantly changing.

item.title: Dive Into Stephanie Matto's Drama With a U.S. Senator
item.description: '90 Day Fiancé' Alum Stephanie Matto Unveils Secret Romance With U.S. Senator'90 Day Fiancé' alum Stephanie Matto is airing out her alleged relationship with a U.S. Senator on TikTok. By Allison DeGrushePublished July 17 2024, 4:51 p.m. ET Source: TikTok / @stephaniemattoThe political world got a wild shake-up in July 2024 when 90 Day Fiancé alum Stephanie Matto dropped a bombshell: She's been secretly dating a U.S. senator for a year!

item.title: Enrique Iglesias - Age, Family, Bio
Kamala Harris Has Been Accused of Plagiarizing MLK for Her "Fweedom" Story
item.description: Kamala Harris Accused of Plagiarizing Her "Fweedom Story" From Martin Luther King Jr.By Shannon RaphaelPublished Jan. 5 2021, 11:56 a.m. ET Source: InstagramWhen Joe Biden and Kamala Harris were announced as the winners of the 2020 Presidential Election in November of 2020, the two had already been on a tireless press junket to share their platforms and to encourage people to vote. Though they did seemingly countless interviews during this time, one, in particular, is now getting a lot of focus.

item.title: Police Panel To Grill Abba Kyari Over Hushpuppi's Fraud Case
item.description: The Nigeria Police Force (NPF) is set to set up a panel to probe a deputy commissioner of police, Abba Kyari, over his alleged relationship with Ramon Abbas, popularly known as Husphuppi. Recall that Hushpuppi was arrested in the UAE in June 2020 alongside 11 of his associates over allegations bordering on hacking, impersonation, scamming, banking fraud, and identity theft. He had earlier pleaded guilty to the money laundering charges against him, putting him at the risk of 20 years imprisonment.

item.title: Bernice King - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Youngest child of Martin Luther King, Jr. who was the CEO of The King Center and served as a Baptist minister.  Before Fame She was only five years old when her mother delivered the news that her father had been shot to death. Trivia She received the Legend Award at the commemoration of the 50th anniversary of the I Have a Dream speech. Family Life She and her brother Martin Luther King III were engaged in legal battles against their brother Dexter King over alleged mismanagement of King Center funds.

item.title: Early marriage: Causes, effects, problems, how early is too early?
item.description: There are many nations and tribes worldwide for whom early marriage is a long-lasting tradition preserved throughout the centuries. It may sound terrifying, but early marriages are still popular in remote areas, and most people still practice them. What are the causes and effects of early marriage? The immature individuals, who get married, are not always stable enough to cope with the difficulties that come with marriage. What makes people get married early, and what are the consequences?

item.title: Jaco Pastorius - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Jazz bassist who created intricate solos and singing melodies in his works. He worked with artists like Joni Mitchell and was a member of Weather Report. Before Fame He started out playing drums, but a wrist injury playing football at the age of thirteen that required surgery left him unable to play. Trivia He was inducted into the Down Beat Jazz Hall of Fame. Family Life He was the first of three children born to John Francis Pastorius II.

item.title: Pernille Harder - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Striker who signed with Wolfsburg of the Bundesliga after spending four years in Sweden with Linköpings. She has also represented the Danish national team, earning her first senior international cap in 2009. Before Fame She played her youth soccer with Tulstrup-Faurholt and Ikast before making her senior domestic debut with Team Viborg in 2007. Trivia She represented Denmark in the 2013 and 2017 UEFA Women's Euro. She was named Danish Football Player of the Year in 2015 and 2016.

item.title: Top 10 tasty Igbo foods, their names, pictures, and ingredients
item.description: Igbo culture is one of the three major cultures in Nigeria. Igbo foods are very easy and simple to cook and eat. Moreover, this type of food is welcomed not only by this tribe but all Nigerians. Here is a list of Igbo native foods you can try out. Igbo is considered to be one of the three major tribes in Nigeria. It has its unique customs, traditions, and music, but it's necessary to concentrate on food that is presented in Igbo culture.

item.title: 2023: I Thought Buhari Was Honest, Meant Well For Nigeria
item.description: A spokesman for the Atiku Campaign Organisation, Daniel Bwala, says he supported the All Progressives Congress (APC) for seven years because of President Muhammadu Buhari. Bwala stated that he thought the President Buhari was honest and someone who was going to take the country to the next level, hence his decision to back his Presidency. In a chat with The Punch, Bwala said he thought Buhari‘s honesty was enough to bring about the change the country needs, but he has been disappointed so far.

item.title: I Will Tackle Floods, Other Issues In Kogi If I Become President
item.description: The presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu, promised Kogi State residents on Thursday that if elected as the president of Nigeria come 2023, his administration will tackle the challenges in the state. The former Governor of Lagos State sympathized with the citizens over the recent havoc caused by floods in the state. Tinubu described the flooding events in the state as disturbing, stating that his leadership with Kashim Shettima (his running mate) will work with the state government to address the issues if they eventually take over leadership from President Muhammadu Buhari come next year.

item.title: Ken Berry - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Bashful cavalry captain Wilton Parmenter on the series, F Troop who also starred in The Carol Burnett Show and its spin-off Mama's Family. Before Fame He won a local talent competition for his tap dancing abilities at age 15 and received an offer to join a traveling performance ensemble. Trivia He acted alongside Carol Burnett in Once Upon A Mattress. Family Life He married Jackie Joseph in 1960 and together they adopted a daughter and son.

item.title: What Was Wrestler Jay Briscoes Cause of Death?
item.description: Wrestler Jay Briscoe Passes Away at Age 38By Allison HuntPublished Jan. 17 2023, 11:08 p.m. ET Source: Ring of HonorTuesday evening was a sad one as another great athlete and entertainment passed away: Jay Briscoe. Jay was professional wrestler known for his time in the Ring of Honor promotion where he won multiple championships. That's 15 championships to be exact: one ROH World Championship, one ROH Six-Man World Tag Team Championship, and was currently the reining ROH World Tag-Team Champion, winning a consecutive 13 years in a row with his brother, Mark.

item.title: When Do 'Fortnite' Arena Points Reset? Chapter 3 Season 3 Info
item.description: Arena points in 'Fortnite' will reset after a certain period of time, putting everyone back at Level 1. But when do they reset for the current season? With online battle royale games like Fortnite, the developers continuously bring in new seasons to keep the content interesting and introduce new features, modes, skins, and more to the game. Chapter 3, Season 3 of the popular free-to-play title is all about the vibes, but players are already thinking about the arena points they've earned.

item.title: Former Governor, Yarima Declares Intention To Run For Presidency
item.description: A former Governor of Zamfara State, Ahmad Sani Yarima has declared his intention to join the 2023 Presidential race. Yarima while speaking during a BBC Hausa Service programme said he would contest in the general elections since President Muhammadu Buhari’s tenure is ending. He said, “If God spares my life, by 2023 I would go into the contest for the post of the President of the Federal Republic of Nigeria. “In 2007 I made similar attempts but the Arewa Consultative Forum and other respected elders of the North pleaded with me and other contenders to step down for Muhammadu Buhari and I agreed.

item.title: Garrison Keillor - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Radio host, writer, and storyteller famous for his work on A Prairie Home Companion. His popular radio variety show, broadcast live from Saint Paul, Minnesota and various touring locations, featured a humorous "News from Lake Wobegon" segment, as well as numerous musical performances. Before Fame In 1966, he received an English degree from the University of Minnesota. Trivia He began his radio career with Minnesota Educational Radio in 1969. He portrayed himself in the 2006 movie  A Prairie Home Companion.

item.title: Karissa Pukas - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Canadian style and makeup YouTube guru who publishes tutorials, reviews, tags, Q&As, and more to her highly popular self-titled channel, where she has over 700,000 subscribers. She has been verified on her karissapukas Instagram account. Before Fame Her first video on YouTube was appropriately titled "Helloooo YouTube," which she published on October 7, 2010. Trivia She is the owner of an eyelash company called SocialEyes Lashes. Family Life She moved from Canada to the Central Coast of Australia.

item.description: Rising social media personality who began to establish herself on platforms such as Instagram, musical.ly and YouNow. Before Fame She started to develop her social media presence in early-to-mid 2016. Her first musical.ly video included an original sound from Loren Beech. Trivia She has earned over 30,000 followers on Instagram. Family Life She is from Pennsylvania. Associated With She used to have a Bars and Melody fan account. item.title: Michael Oher - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: NFL offensive lineman whose life inspired the movie The Blind Side. He spent the first five years of his career with the Baltimore Ravens, winning Super Bowl XLVII with the team in 2013. He joined the Carolina Panthers in 2015 and helped lead the team to Super Bowl 50 in 2016. Before Fame He had two deadbeat parents and struggled to find food and shelter, and eventually found a loving family that gave him the tools necessary to prosper.

item.title: Fernando Alonso - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Spanish race car driver who became one of the greatest Formula One drivers since making his debut with Minardi in 2001. He is a two-time Formula One World Champion and won the 2019 24 Hours of Daytona. Before Fame He started off competing in karting competitions around Spain. Trivia He won his first world championship in 2005. He won the 2018-2019 FIA World Endurance Championship with Toyota Gazoo Racing. Family Life He was married to Raquel del Rosario from 2006 until 2011.

item.title: Is Tom Brady a Trump Supporter? He and the Former POTUS Are Old Golfing Buddies
item.description: Is Tom Brady a Trump supporter? The Tampa Bay Buccaneers quarterback has been friendly with the former POTUS for years. What does he really think? Source: Getty ImagesAs a general rule of thumb, most professional athletes tend to stay away from politics — and this includes Tom Brady. Although the Tampa Bay Buccaneers quarterback has been directly asked whether he supported the 45th president of the United States when Donald Trump was still in office, Brady seemed to dance around the answer.

item.title: Keith Habersberger - Age, Family, Bio
Olamide's Babymama, Maria Speaks On Alleged N2 Million From Singer To Commit Abortion
item.description: On-Air Personality, Maria Okan, the babymama of Nigerian singer, Olamide, has opened up on rumours of receiving 2 million naira from the singer to abort her pregnancy in 2019. Naija News reports that in the wake of Maria’s pregnancy, it was alleged that she collected N2 million from Olamide for abortion after confronting him about the pregnancy. Three years after the brouhaha, Maria on Monday, 5th September,  surprisingly took to social media to share her struggles while announcing her new job at the British Broadcasting Corporation (BBC) in the United Kingdom.

item.title: CBS Has Spoken! The Official Cast Announcement for 'Survivor 43' Is Here
item.description: The ‘Survivor’ Season 43 cast has finally been revealed, and we are now itching to get to know these cast members even better on screen. Source: CBSWith only a few weeks until Season 43 of Survivor, fans are itching to know who will be part of the historic series. With over 620 episodes under its belt and 646 castaways, Survivor has now been on air for over 22 years. Beyond the show’s longevity, host Jeff Probst has been there every step of the way to make Survivor what it is today.

item.title: Influencers Are Swimming in a Toxic Blue Lake to Get the Perfect Picture
item.description: Influencers Are Getting Sick After Swimming in a Toxic Lake for the 'GramBy Robin ZlotnickUpdated July 25 2019, 1:56 p.m. ET Source: InstagramAnything for the 'gram, right? That's the #influencerlife. I've seen influencers peddling clearly disgusting health food products, wearing ridiculous, impractical athleisure clothing, and generally orchestrating their entire lives to look good on Instagram. It's an epidemic! And it's getting serious because some of these influencers don't just stop at collagen peptides and summer sandals.

item.title: What Is the Sleepy Chicken TikTok Trend? Here's the 4-1-1
item.description: TikTok's Sleepy Chicken Trend Is Giving Social Media Users Major PauseBy Tatayana YomaryUpdated Sept. 21 2022, 4:27 p.m. ET Source: @igrobflo/TikTokThe food community of TikTok is known to share a plethora of tasty recipes and healthy snacks. From the beloved Nature’s Cereal trend to the Corn Ribs phenomenon, the possibilities are truly endless for creators looking to diversify their culinary skills. While these recipes are known to make our mouths water, there are some that have left us disgusted with both the recipes themselves and with humanity as a whole.

item.title: Will Ferrell Refused to Star in a Sequel to Elf Heres Why
item.description: 'Elf' became an instant holiday classic when it debuted in 2003, so why did Will Ferrell turn down making a part 2? Source: New Line CinemaThere are some actors — not many, but some — who refuse to make sequels. Johnny Depp reportedly was of this mind, prior to signing on for Pirates of Caribbean, a film that probably would've been dead in the water if it wasn't for his creative decisions in crafting the Jack Sparrow character (decisions that made him fear he'd be fired nearly every day on set).

item.title: Helena Rojo - Edad, Familia, Biografa
item.description: Acerca De Actriz mexicana de teatro y cine cuyos créditos cinematográficos incluyen Los Amigos, El Club de los Suicidas y Borderline. Antes de la Fama Sus primeros créditos televisivos incluyen papeles en La Venganza y Mañana Es Otro Día. Curiosidades Ganó dos Premios Ariel de la Academia Mexicana de Cine por sus actuaciones en Misterio y Fin de Fiesta. Vida Familiar Dio a luz a dos hijas y un hijo durante su primer matrimonio con el actor Juan Ferrara.

item.title: June 10 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: Your warm and likable demeanor has been seen in several prominent entertainers born on June 10th, such as Judy Garland and Hattie McDaniel. While acting may not be your interest, you may enjoy some type of artistic expression as a hobby. For a career, you will be happiest in a setting where your social abilities flourish, such as customer service, education, sales or business. If you find a cause worth supporting, you may do well in the political arena, on the community level or beyond.

item.title: Kiddiwaya Wins HOH, Picks Tolanibaj Over Erica As Deputy HOH
item.description: Kiddiwaya has won Monday’s night Head of House game, becoming the first male HOH of the BBNaija Lockdown edition. Naija News reports that Kiddiwaya became the HOH for the fifth week of the ongoing Big Brother season five. The newest HOH topped the dice game that spotted a gold chest twist this week, with housemates Prince and BrightO following closely. After winning the game, Kiddiwaya selected Tolanibaj as his Deputy HOH.

item.title: Ty Miller (TV Actor) - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Actor best known for his role as The Kid on The Young Riders and his appearances on series like Without a Trace and The X-Files. Before Fame He first appeared onscreen as Max on the series Easy Street in 1986. Trivia He has a bachelor's degree in Business from the University of Southern California. Family Life His brother Will runs the biggest Christmas tree retailer in the United States. Associated With He co-starred with Travis Fine on ABC's The Young Riders.

item.title: Woman Catfished by Restaurant in Sick Business Scam
item.description: Woman Gets Stood up by Date, Realizes She Was Catfished by Restaurant to Dine ThereBy Mustafa GatollariJan. 24 2024, Published 10:37 a.m. ET Source: TikTok | @paretayA woman who was stood up by someone she matched with on a dating app believes she was on the receiving end of a con some restaurants have purportedly been conducting more and more frequently: dining date ditches. Taylor (@paretay) uploaded a viral clip where she discusses how she matched with someone on a dating app, and realized after she arrived there she had been stood up and then ghosted.

item.title: Buhari Arrives Cotonou For Niger Basin Authority Summit
item.description: Nigeria’s president, Muhammadu Buhari has arrived in Cotonou, the Republic of Benin, for the 11th summit of the heads of state and government of the Niger Basin Authority. [article_adwert] According to a statement signed by Adamu Sambo, the president was received by the prime minister of the Republic of Benin, Mr Lionel Zinsou, Nigeria’s ambassador to Benin, Lawrence Obisakin, the minister of water resources, Suleiman Adamu, the minister of state foreign affairs and members of the Nigerian community in the neighbouring west African country.

item.title: Clark Speaks On Who Should Become Next Delta State Governor
item.description: Prominent Ijaw leader, Chief Edwin Clark has spoken on the political disagreement between Delta State Governor, Ifeanyi Okowa, and a former State Governor, Chief James Ibori. Naija News understands both Okowa and Ibori are at loggerheads over who should become the next Governor of Delta State. However, Clark has now thrown his weight behind Okowa in the race for who emerges the next Delta State Governor. Speaking during an interview with Vanguard, the Ijaw leader said Ibori shouldn’t interfere with how the next state Governor should emerge and allow Okowa to decide who should be his successor in consultation with the people of the state.

item.title: Governor Obaseki Celebrates Super Eagles' 1-0 Win Over Ivory Coast
item.description: The Super Eagles who were not given any chance of making progress in the tournament after their disappointing 1-1 draw with Equatorial Guinea, were organized enough to grab all three points against the hosts, Ivory Coast, on Thursday, January 18. Victor Osimhen who couldn’t test the Ivorian goalkeeper, Yahia Fofana as much as expected, was fouled in the box in the second half and earned the Eagles a penalty after a VAR review.

item.title: Man Tells Girlfriend to Wear Orange Dress to Funeral
item.description: This woman was hesitant when her boyfriend told her to wear orange to a "non-traditional" funeral, but decided to trust him. Then, she regretted it. Being caught out of dress code is never ideal, but there are few situations where underdressing (or overdressing) is a worse crime than at a funeral. Sure, wearing white to a wedding is generally considered to be pretty disrespectful, but what's more inconsiderate than causing a scene at someone's celebration of life — even worse, someone you don't know?

item.title: Yoruba Actress, Toyin Aimakhu Is Pregnant (PHOTOS)
item.description: Popular actress, Toyin Aimakhu-Johnson, poses for the camera as she shows off her baby bump at a recent fashion event in Lagos. Toyin Aimakhu Johnson who recently showed off her new tattoo of her husband's name on her ring finger got married to Niyi Johnson in July 2013. Toyin had denied various report that she was pregnant, with claims that she had delivered while others claimed she lost the pregnancy. Well it seems this pictures have proved otherwise.

item.title: Angus Sampson - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Television, film, and voice-over actor known as The Organic Mechanic in Mad Max: Fury Road, the Insidious series, and for his role as Bear Gerhardt on season two of FX's Fargo. He was well-known for the Australian Channel 10 series, Party Tricks, which was cancelled right before he was offered the role in Fargo. Before Fame He attended The Armidale School in the Northern part of his home state, New South Wales. He then went on to graduate form the AWARD School in 2002.

item.title: David Reinoso - Edad, Familia, Biografa
item.description: Acerca De Actor ecuatoriano que es mejor reconocido por sus papeles recurrentes en televisión. Es conocido por sus apariciones en los programas Ni Ni Live Live, Vivos, La Pareja Feliz y La Tremebunda Corte. Se especializa en personajes de parodia y es conocido por interpretar a Hugo Chávez y Laura Bozzo. Antes de la Fama Comenzó su carrera actoral en el teatro La Mueca donde trabajó como una asistente. Más tarde hizo su debut televisivo en 1990 cuando apareció en un episodio de Agua Mojada.

item.title: Joe Bryant - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Known as Jellybean, he played basketball professionally in the NBA, Italy and France and is the father of Kobe Bryant. His coaching career has taken him to the ABA, WNBA, and Japan. Before Fame He was a three-year starter at La Salle University from 1973 to 1975. Trivia He was selected 14th overall by the Golden State Warriors in the 1975 NBA Draft. Family Life He had two daughters, along with son Kobe Bryant, with Pam Cox, whom he married in 1975.

item.title: Was Itskobe's Death an Accident? How the 19-Year-Old YouTuber Died
item.description: Was Itskobe's death an accident? The popular YouTube star, whose real name is Kobe Nunez, recently passed away at only 19 years old. Comedy enthusiasts and avid YouTube fans are currently mourning the death of social media personality Kobe Nunez, who is best known by his YouTube username, ItsKobe. The Dominican-Republic-born YouTube star was 19 years old, and had garnered almost 50,000 subscribers on the social media platform. He created his account in 2018, and quickly rose to fame for his pranks and comedic content.

item.title: What Happened to Montecore? The White Tiger That Mauled Roy Lived a Long Life
item.description: Siegfried and Roy's Las Vegas act was canceled after Roy was mauled by a giant white tiger. But what ever happened to Montecore after the attack? Source: Getty ImagesBack in the day, Siegfried Fischbacher and Roy Horn were the epitome of Las Vegas entertainment — well, the German-American duo and their big cats, that is. That's because their signature show incorporated lions and tigers performing alongside them as they wowed packed crowds with spectacular disappearing acts.

item.title: 2023: Tinubu Coming To Add Value To Nigerian Presidency
item.description: Joe Igbokwe, an aide to Governor Babajide Sanwo-Olu of Lagos State says Presidential aspirant, Bola Tinubu is coming to add value to the Nigerian Presidency. In a post via his Facebook page on Saturday, Igbokwe stated that the National Leader of the All Progressives Congress (APC) is coming to serve Nigerians. He added that Tinubu wants to apply his experience and energy to serve Nigeria the way he laid the foundation for the growth of Lagos State.

item.title: Chelsea Move To Sign Saul Niguez From Atletico Madrid
item.description: UEFA Champions league winners, Chelsea has joined Manchester United in the race for Atletico Madrid midfielder, Saul Niguez. Naija News understands that the English Premier League rivals are both keen on signing the Spanish professional footballer, but Chelsea according to findings are hopeful of completing Niguez’s move this summer to boost their midfield. Thomas Tuchel is looking forward to include Niguez deal and add him to his first-team plans for this season.

item.title: Nate Diaz - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Lightweight and welterweight fighter who won the fifth season of The Ultimate Fighter. In 2016, he submitted Conor McGregor, ending the latter's five-year unbeaten streak. Before Fame He began training in mixed martial arts after his brother entered the UFC, training with him at the gym and sparring with him. He made his pro debut at 19 years old. item.title: 12 Petroleum Marketers Arrested For Reopening Sealed Stations
item.description: Twelve petroleum marketers were arrested on Friday in Kogi State for allegedly removing Nigeria Mainstream Downstream Petroleum Regulatory Authority (NMDPRA)’s closure seal and returning to petrol sale at their various stations. Naija News reports that the petrol marketers were apprehended by operatives of the Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps (NSCDC), who collaborated with the NMDPRA. In June this year, NMDPRA reportedly sealed 50 out of 90 fuel stations operating in Kogi state over offences ranging from expired licenses and under-dispensing of products, among others.

item.description: The governing body of football in Africa, CAF, claimed that it received a total of 5,000 applications for media coverage of the 2023 AFCON which is 90% more than the applications CAF received for the 2021 edition of the tournament held in Ivory Coast. Alisema tatizo kubwa kwa wasanii wengi chipukizi ni kutekwa na umaarufu wao kwa mashabiki na kuanza kufikiria kuwa wao ni familia. Alisema fikra hiyo imewafanya wasanii wengi kuishi maisha ya mitandaoni bila kujua kuwa mashabiki hawawezi kuwasaidia. "Wacheni kuita mashabiki wenu eti familia. Wacheni mambo ya kuamka kila asubuhi kuwaambia kile unakula au vile unavyo vaa,"

item.title: Teen Wolf Star Tyler Posey Revealed He Is "Sexually Fluid" on OnlyFans
item.description: ‘Teen Wolf’ star Tyler Posey recently announced that he joined the OnlyFans family, and fans are having mixed feelings about the news. Source: InstagramSince the creation of the “exclusive content” website OnlyFans, celebrities have slowly been making their way onto the site to create their own profiles. OnlyFans, typically known for the allowance of explicit, adult content, has gained major traction in the last year when celebrities like Bella Thorne and Aaron Carter joined in on the action, for better or for worse.

item.title: Things To Know About New Chief Of Defence Staff, Christopher Musa
item.description: President Bola Tinubu on Monday night made a sweeping move by dismissing all of the current service chiefs. This unexpected change comes as part of his broader efforts to reshape national security leadership. Among these new appointments, Nuhu Ribadu was elevated from his position as Special Adviser on Security Matters to become the National Security Adviser (NSA). This promotion places him at the forefront of the country’s security strategy and policymaking.

item.title: Brandon Pent - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Former dancer who appeared in several episodes of Lifetime's hit series Dance Moms. He stopped dancing in 2013 to join the Air Force. Before Fame He was named Junior Mr. Dance of Pennsylvania and Teen Mr. Dance of Pennsylvania in 2008 and 2011, respectively. Trivia He started dating Ryleigh Vertes, one of Kendall's older sisters and the daughter of Jill Vertes, in 2014. Family Life He is from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania and was born to parents Fred and Diane Pent.

item.title: Eion Bailey - Age, Family, Bio
Former CJN, Onnoghen Opens Up On Why Buhari Sacked Him
item.description: Former Chief Justice of Nigeria (CJN), Walter Onnoghen has revealed why he was relieved of his position by the President Muhammadu Buhari led government. Naija News recalls that Onnoghen was ousted from office by the Buhari administration in 2019 unceremoniously. Speaking in Abuja on Friday, March 19 at a book launch titled ‘Fundamental Rights (Enforcement Procedure) Rules, 2009, Practice, Procedure, Forms and Precedents’, authored by a renowned legal luminary, Chief Ogwu James Onoja, the former CJN said his removal from office was due to rumoured reports from the executives that he had a conversation with Atiku Abubakar, former vice president of Nigeria.

item.title: Genea Charpentier - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Film and television actress most well known for bringing to life the characters of Jennifer Smith in The Man in the High Castle and Laura Campbell in When Calls the Heart. Before Fame She made her first acting appearance in 2009 in an episode of Defying Gravity. Trivia She plays Isabel Beckman in both the 2013 film Dangerous Intuition and the 2014 movie Run for Your Life. Family Life Her older sister, Megan, is also an actress known for her appearances in films like Mama and Resident Evil: Retribution.

item.title: Restaurant Won't Allow Emotional Support Animals Because They're Not Trained for Service
item.description: A sign posted in a restaurant explains that emotional support animals will not be allowed as they are not the same as service animals trained to help people with disabilities. It is no secret that people have started to take advantage of the idea of "emotional support animals" to get their pets access to places where they wouldn't normally be allowed, like planes or restaurants. This is not to say there aren't valid reasons for someone to be prescribed an emotional support animal — there definitely are.

item.title: Cali Sheldon - Age, Family, Bio
Ella Gross - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Model and social media star who has worked as a signee to LA Models' roster, and modeled for companies such as Abercrombie. In 2018, she began appearing in the TV series Heathers as young Betty. In 2019, she'd star in Malibu Rescue. Before Fame She published her first photo to Instagram in March 2016. Trivia She has amassed more than 4 million followers to her Instagram account.  Family Life Her Instagram account has been run by her mother.

item.title: Kenneth Omeruo Says Nigeria's Game Against Ghana Is More Than A Friendly
item.description: Super Eagles defender, Kenneth Omeruo, has noted that the international friendly game between Nigeria and Ghana is more than just a friendly. Kenneth Omeruo, who is currently the longest-serving member of the Super Eagles squad that will face the Black Stars of Ghana at 5 p.m. later today, March 22, said he and his teammates are ready for the game. Omeruo was part of the squad that finished second in the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations in Ivory Coast on February 11, 2024.

item.title: Nicolas Jackson Completes Medical At Chelsea
item.description: Senegalese striker Nicolas Jackson has completed his medical at Chelsea as he gets set to seal his move to the Premier League club from Villarreal. Nicolas Jackson’s contract with Villarreal has a €35 million release clause which Chelsea have reportedly agreed to pay. However, the terms of an eight-year contract at Stamford Bridge are still being worked out. In January, the 22-year-old Senegalese striker almost joined Bournemouth for a transfer fee worth £22.

item.title: Senate Confirms Farouk Yahaya As New Chief Of Army Staff
item.description: The Nigerian Senate on Tuesday confirmed the appointment of Major General Farouk Yahaya as the Chief of Army Staff. Recall that President Muhammadu Buhari had appointed General Yahaya as the Chief of Army Staff following the death of Lt. General Ibrahim Attahiru who died in a plane crash near Kaduna International Airport penultimate Friday. Buhari had last week, written to the Senate, seeking for the confirmation of the appointment of Major General Farouk Yahaya as the Chief of Army Staff.

item.title: BBI Standoff: IEBC Insists Only One Version of Bill Was Sent to Counties
item.description: - The commission's chairperson Wafula Chebakati said the electoral agency first received six printed copies of the draft BBI Bill 2020 in December 2020 - The IEBC requested the BBI promoters for additional printed copies, and it received 57 and sent 47 copies to the county assemblies in January 2021 - It emerged that 34 county assemblies processed an erroneous bill that referred to a non-existent article of the constitution

item.title: How much does the most expensive Funko Pop cost?
item.description: The most expensive Funko pop has an unbelievable price tag, and with good reason. To some people, these little and often creepy animated figures are the closest things to an action movie. To others, they are the only toys that suit adults. Funko Pops are not only the most talked about but also the most popular adult toys in comic stores. Since they first hit the market in 1998, a majority of them have become more affordable by the day.

item.title: Kidnapped Taraba Traditional Ruler, Son Found Dead
item.description: The kindred head of Yukuben Chiefdom in Takum local government area of Taraba State, Chief Udeng Ibrahim who was reportedly kidnapped alongside his son, Musa Ibrahim on Wednesday have been found dead. A local from the area told our correspondent that the traditional ruler was abducted on Wednesday while returning from a peace meeting between stakeholders of Takum and Ussa local government. Naija News reports that Ussa and Takum local governments have between June and July 2022, come under persistent attack by suspected Fulani herdsmen where over 60 residents have been killed, 25 communities sacked and over 120,000 people displaced.

item.title: Maxi Priest, msanii wa reggae kutoka Jamaica anatarajiwa jijini Nairobi
item.description: - Maxi priest anatarajiwa nchini mwezi wa Agosti - Atatumbuiza katika Racecourse Waterfront jijini Nairobi kwanzia mchana - Msanii anajulikana kwa kuimba muziki wa reggae na asili ya muziki wa R&B - Atakuwa miongoni mwa wasanii wa hali ya juu kuitembelea Kenya - Baadhi ya wasanii ambao wametembelea Kenya kutoka Jamaica ni pamoja na Glen Washington, Roman Virgo, Cecile na Alain Ni habari njema kwa wapendao mziki aina ya reggae kwani msanii shupavu wa raga maarufu kama Maxi Priest anakuja nchini kuwatumbuiza na mziki wake wa reggae.

item.title: Top manufacturing companies in Nigeria
item.description: The manufacturing company works by converting raw material into finished goods. This is a profitable business, that is why there is a huge amount of manufacturing companies in Nigeria. We will tell you about the most popular and respectable ones. Manufacturing industry: top companies in Nigeria Nigeria’s economy is fully dependent on its manufacturing industry. In Nigeria, the manufacturing sector brings about 10% of each year’s GDP. Millions of Nigerians are involved in this industry and they help to improve the country’s economy.

item.title: 2023: Tinubu Will Retire Atiku To Dubai, Obi Is A Mediocre
item.description: The Vice Presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Kashim Shettima, has taken a swipe at the presidential candidates of the Labour Party (LP) and the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Peter Obi and Atiku Abubakar, respectively. The former Governor of Borno State has claimed that his principal, Bola Tinubu, would permanently retire Atiku to Dubai in the United Arab Emirates in 2023. He mocked the former Vice President for failing to unite his party, stressing that he wondered how the PDP candidate would unite the country.

item.title: BBNaija Nengi Appointed As SSA To Bayelsa State Governor
item.description: Former housemate of Nigeria’s biggest reality show, Big Brother Naija, Rebecca Nengi Hampson has been appointed as a senior special assistant to Governor Douye Diri of Bayelsa State. The development was confirmed by the 22-year-old reality TV star on her microblogging site account on Friday, November 6 while responding to congratulatory messages from fellow reality tv stars and fans. A month ago, the winner of the Big Brother Naija lockdown edition, Laycon was appointed as the Youth Ambassador of Ogun State by Governor Dapo Abiodun.

item.title: Kakamega: Kijogoo aachwa mataani baada ya njama ya kunasa kipusa kutibuka
item.description: Barobaro mmoja kutoka Kakamega mjini ambaye alikuwa amepanga njama ya kumnasa mrembo kwenye deti akitumia pombe aliachwa mataani baada ya demu kugundua na kumwacha. Duru zinaarifu kwamba kipusa huyo ambaye alikuwa na msimamo mkali aliapa kwamba hangempakulia mwanamume yeyote asali kabla ya kuoana. Habari Nyingine: Kakamega: Muuguzi azimia na kufariki dunia ghafla Kulingana na Taifa leo, jamaa huyo alipanga kumwalika kwenye deti akinuia kumlewesha pombe hadi abadili msimamo na kuingia boksi yake.

item.title: Nigerian Rapper, Ruggedman Loses Father
item.description: Nigerian rapper cum human rights activist, Michael Ugochukwu Stephens, known professionally as Ruggedman, has lost his father. Naija News reports that the ‘Eruku’ crooner announced the demise of his father via his Instagram page on Wednesday. Sharing a dark image with a candle in it, the rapper said he doesn’t know how to feel about the situation. He wrote: “I dont even know how I feel or what to feel. Rip dad”

item.title: Who Does Vinny Ultimately Pick on Double Shot of Love? Season 3 Is Heating Up (SPOILERS)
item.description: 'Jersey Shore' fans were excited to see Vinny Guadagnino and Pauly D reunited in 'Double Shot of Love.' But who does Vinny pick? Source: MTVSpoiler alert: This article contains spoilers for Double Shot at Love. Love sells. Or at least the idea of it. Reality TV shows relish turning the pursuit of the greatest human emotion into a debased competition where everyone's pretending to be in the game for a noble cause.

item.title: '#EndSARS Protesters' Stole $2m, N17m From Me
item.description: Oba of Lagos, Rilwan Akiolu on Wednesday disclosed that the #EndSARS protesters who stormed his palace last year allegedly stole his $2 million and N17 million. Naija News reports that the Oba of Lagos made this known while speaking at the Glover Hall Memorial Commissioning, Lagos on Wednesday. Akiolu told the people present at the event that he wanted to say it publicly that #EndSARS protesters stole $2 million and N17 million in his palace.

And that was a big mistake for them to do that.” By Pretty HonoreApr. 23 2024, Published 3:00 p.m. ET Source: Kevin Winter/Getty ImagesReciting positive affirmations in the morning can do wonders for the day, and DJ Khaled’s growing repertoire of signature phrases is the perfect place to source new material.

item.title: Unlike Buhari, Tinubu Not Using Anti-corruption Fight To Witch-hunt Opposition Parties
item.description: A former spokesperson of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Olisa Metuh has praised the anti-corruption fight of President Bola Tinubu. According to the PDP chieftain, Tinubu is not using his anti-corruption stand to fight members of the opposition, unlike what obtained under the administration of former President Muhammadu Buhari. The ex-PDP spokesperson, in a statement on Sunday, said opposition members were persecuted under the Buhari administration in the name of fighting corruption.

item.title: Zoning Cannot Stop My Presidential Ambition Yerima
item.description: A former governor of Zamfara State, Senator Ahmad Sani Yerima, has said zoning cannot stop his aspiration to become the next President of the country in 2023. He made this known in a chat with reporters on the sideline of the 25th anniversary and graduation ceremony of Nurul Tilawah International School in Zaria, at the weekend. Yerima, a chieftain of the All Progressives Congress (APC), disclosed that zoning is not recognised by the country’s Constitution and should be rejected by all.

item.title: 2015: Olusegun Obasanjo Endorses Muhammadu Buhari
item.description: Nigeria's former President, Olusegun Obasanjo, endorsed the All Progressives Congress (APC) presidential candidate, Muhammadu Buhari, in the upcoming elections. Punch recalls that it comes after months of him expressing dissatisfaction with the government of President Goodluck Jonathan, running for the second term on the platform of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). OBJ, PDP member, voiced his support for the former military Head of State during the launch of his widely discussed autobiography titled ‘My Watch’ in Kenya.

item.title: Edo State Deputy Governor Retires From Professional Football
item.description: The Edo State Deputy Governor, Comrade Philip Shaibu, has reiterated the state government’s commitment to sports development as an avenue to promote tourism in the state. Naija News reports that Shaibu , in a press conference on Saturday, announced his retirement from professional football. He stated this the match between Bendel Insurance Football Club (FC) and Vandrezzer FC of Lagos which Bendel Insurance won with a scoreline of one goal to nill at the Samuel Ogbemudia Stadium in Benin City.

item.title: Iyabo Ojo, Anita Joseph, Ada Ameh Others React As ChaCha Eke Dumps Her Husband
item.description: Nigerian celebrities like Iyabo Ojo, Ada Ameh, Anita Joseph and many others have expressed concern for their colleague ChaCha Eke Faani over the split from her husband, Austin Faani. Recall that in October 2020, ChaCha took to social media to share a video announcing the end of her marriage to her husband and popular movie director, Austin. A few days later, she shared another video from a hospital bed disclosing that she had been diagnosed with Bipolar disorder while debunking allegations that her marriage ended due to domestic violence

item.description: Series regular on NBC's hit action drama Blindspot as Tasha Zapata who previously starred on ABC's Black Box. She also had a recurring part in Power. Before Fame She trained at the Experimental Theatre Wing of New York University's Tisch School of the Arts. Trivia She has been a guest-star in the Emmy Award winning series The Americans as well as The Following, Blue Bloods and Madam Secretary. Family Life She moved to New York City at the age of 18 for school.

item.title: Jesus Cars - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Mexican television actor known for his appearances on shows like Como Dice El Dicho, La Rosa de Guadalupe, and Quiero Amarte. Before Fame He studied at Televisa's Centro de Educación Artística before scoring his initial television roles. Trivia Active on stage as well as screen, he has appeared in the productions La opera del pordiosero and El tiempo y los Diaz. Family Life He and Eleané Puell welcomed daughter Luciana to the world in February 2016.

item.title: Over 5000 Debtors Owe FG Agencies N4.67tn
item.description: The Federal Government of Nigeria has stated that over 5000 debtors owe its agencies about N4.67tn. Zainab Ahmed, the Minister of Finance, Budget, and National Planning said on Monday that the government had in the past 18 months recovered N53.8bn out of the N5.2tn owed to the 10 ministries, departments and agencies. Ahmed announced this during the launch of the Project Lighthouse Debt Analytics and Reporting platform in Abuja. According to the Minister, the Lighthouse project and the Office of the Account General played a great influence in influencing the discovery and recovery of the outstanding loan.

item.title: Sorry, but the Xbox Series X Probably Won't Be Back in Stock for a Long Time
item.description: If you weren't in line to buy the new Xbox Series X console, chances are you're now wondering when the Series X will be back in stock. Source: xboxIt's been more than a year since the Xbox Series X and its digital counterpart, the Series S, launched — and it seems that many who try to purchase the new console are unable to do so. In fact, most retailers that carry the Xbox Series X have been consistently sold out since it launched.

item.title: We Will Sue Tinubu If He Refuses To Contest For Presidency
item.description: The director general of the Buhari support group has stated that the organization would sue Bola Ahmed Tinubu if he refuses to contest for the 2023 presidency. Aminu Sulaiman, the director of the support group stated this on Monday in Osogbo during the inauguration of the TSO, Osun state chapter. He said that the APC chieftain would be sued if he refused to answer their call of becoming the next president in Nigeria.

item.title: 'Forget Bola Tinubu's Age, He Remains Best Man To Succeed Buhari'
item.description: Former Senator representing Oyo South Senatorial District, Rilwan Adesoji Akanbi, has told youths that Bola Ahmed Tinubu’s age does not matter as he is the best fit to succeed President Muhammadu Buhari in 2023. Naija News reports that Akanbi stated this while speaking in Badagry, Lagos state, during the on-going tour of the state by South West Agenda for Asiwaju (SWAGA) 2023. According to the former Lawmaker, the national leader of the All Progressives Congress has all it takes to lead Nigeria in 2023.

item.title: Aregbesola Wasting His Time, Can't Stop Oyetolas Re-election
item.description: Former Osun State Deputy Governor, Senator Iyiola Omisore has stated that those against the reelection bid of Governor Gboyega Oyetola are only wasting their time. He stated this while speaking in Osogbo, the Osun capital, through the Commissioner for Youths and Sports, Yemi Lawal. The former lawmaker stated that he is focusing on getting Oyetola re-elected during the July 16 governorship election in the state. While staring that he won’t be distracted with the activities of some disgruntled elements, Omisore said claimed that the governor is accepted among members of the All Progressives Congress (APC).

item.title: CBN Warns Against Using Foreign Currencies For Domestic Transaction
item.description: The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) has warned individuals and corporate organisations against the use of foreign currency to carry out transactions in the country. This decision was made public on April 7, 2015, through a press release signed by Alhaji Ibrahim Mu’azu, Director, Corporate Communications. “The attention of the bank has been drawn to the increasing use of foreign currencies in the domestic economy as a medium of payment for goods and services by individuals and corporate organisations.

item.title: Mohbad's Father Asks Coroner To Summon Primeboy, Two Others
item.description: The father of the late singer, llerioluwa Aloba, also known as Mohbad, Joseph Aloba, has reportedly requested the Coroner to summon Ayobami Fisayo (popularly known as Spending), Boluwatife Adeyemo (better known as Darosha), and Ibrahim Owodunni (known as Prime Boy) to testify and provide eyewitness accounts regarding the events leading to the singer’s death. Naija News understands that Joseph made the request through his lawyers in a letter, dated January 15, 2024, and signed by one of the lawyers, Emmanuel Oroko, emphasising that the testimonies of these individuals will contribute to a more comprehensive understanding of the unnatural and suspicious circumstances surrounding September 12, 2023, which prompted the establishment of a coroner inquest.

item.title: Will Smith's son Jaden explains why he stopped using family name
item.description: - Jaden Smith said as an artiste with different talents, he tries to create various characters for himself - As a musician, the celebrity wanted to be referred to as only Jaden but as an actor, he wanted his last name to be recognised - Will Smith's son said he looked back at how his sister Willow successfully flew high with only one name and thought it was bold, cool and strong

item.title: John Quincy Adams - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Sixth President of the United States who was also an influential diplomat, US Senator, and US Congressional representative. Before Fame He traveled to Europe with his father on American envoys to France and the Netherlands. Trivia His skills as a diplomat set many historic precedents, including bringing an end to the War of 1812 with the Treaty of Ghent and closing off North and South America to European colonization with the Monroe Doctrine.

item.title: Benefits of humility in life according to the Bible
item.description: Lewis Carroll in his famous book “Alice in Wonderland” said, “True humility is not thinking less of yourself; it is thinking of yourself less”. What is humility and what are the benefits of humility? Read in the article below. Photo from blog.adw.org What does it mean to have humility?Acting with humility has many benefits to human life. It is helpful in reducing any negative impact. In the present day society, overconfidence seems to be much more popular than humility.

item.title: Is Christina Anthony's Role as Aunt Denise on 'Mixed-ish' Her First?
item.description: Christina Anthony had just about every reason to throw in the towel before she booked 'mixed-ish' — or so she thought. Source: CBSChristina Anthony is a multifaceted actress, vocalist, improviser, and writer. She is best known as the spunky Aunt Denise on the hit sitcom mixed-ish, which is a spinoff of ABC's black-ish. The show mainly centers around young Rainbow Johnson (Arica Himmel), Tracee Ellis Ross's character from black-ish, and how she became the dynamic woman she is today.

item.title: Super Eagles Captain, Ahmed Musa Loses Family Member, Leaves Camp
item.description: Nigerian professional footballer and Super Eagles captain, Ahmed Musa, has been bereaved. Reports reaching Naija News at the moment confirmed that the 29-year-old player missed the Super Eagles’ last training session on Wednesday December 5, after receiving the sad news. According to Sahara Reporters, the National Team management sympathized with the Fatih Karagumruk of Turkey striker and subsequently granted him permission to leave the team’s camp to be with family members.

item.title: What Happened to Dillon the Hacker? We Have Some Very Bad News
item.description: What happened to Dillon the Hacker? The YouTuber garnered fame with videos that saw him launch attacks on many YouTube celebrities. Where is he now? Source: YoutubeDillon the Hacker (Dillon Prescott Henderson) obtained an enormous social media following by playing tricks on established content creators like PewDiePie, James Charles, and Jenna Marbles. Many have fallen for his mock smear campaigns, including Markiplier, a fellow gamer who ventured so far as to sue him for defamation.

item.title: 'The King's Man' Prequel Film Will Set up the Future for the 'Kingsman' Franchise

Source: 20th Century StudiosThe success of 2014's Kingsman: The Secret Service was surprising, to say the least. The little-celebrated comic series by Mark Millar was adapted into a highly stylized and entertaining spy thriller that represented a welcome departure from standard comic book adaptations at the time.

item.title: Man Died From Ebola In Port Harcourt
item.description: Nigeria's health minister Onyebuchi Chukwu has today confirmed the first recorded death from Ebola in Port Harcourt. It would be recalled that yesterday it was unofficially reported that the doctor whose name is yet to be provided died August 22 in Port Harcourt, Rivers State, from the deadly tropical virus. The top Nigerian health official confirmed August 28 the information: "This primary contact of Mr. Sawyer’s evaded our surveillance team in the last week of July 2014 and travelled out of Lagos to Port Harcourt where, as we now understand, he consulted with a doctor and was apparently treated for some symptoms.

item.title: President Buhari calls for unity in Sallah message to Nigerians
item.description: - President Muhammadu Buhari expresses gratitude to Nigerians for praying for his recovery prior to his return from the UK - The president appeals to Nigerians to strengthen the bonds of friendship and unity to keep the country together - Buhari says his administration will continue work relentlessly to ensure that Nigeria becomes the dream country of every citizen President Muhammadu Buhari has felicitated with Nigerians, particularly the Muslims faithful on the Eid-El- celebrations.

item.title: What You Should Know About Late Captain Hosa Okunbo
item.description: Naija News had earlier reported that Edo State-born politician, philanthropist and business mogul, Captain Hosa Okunbo is dead. The billionaire, 63, died at the early hours of today Sunday after a long battle with cancer. Okunbo, Chairman of Ocean Marine Solution Limited, died in London, United Kingdom. Brief profile: Idahosa (Hosa) Wells Okunbo (born 7 January 1958) was a Nigerian business magnate, investor, philanthropist and trained commercial pilot. He served as either chairman or director on numerous company boards in Nigeria, spanning multiple business sectors such as the agro-allied, petroleum, telecommunications, power, real estate and banking industries.

item.title: 'Ganduje Is Under The Influence Of Alcohol'
item.description: The Biafra Nations League, BNL slammed Kano State Governor Abdullahi Umar Ganduje for declaring that the Igbos and Yorubas are the minority groups in Nigeria. Governor Ganduje is alleged to have declared in a statement earlier that northerners own Nigeria. Reacting to the alleged statement, Ebuta Akor Takon, Deputy Leader of BNL and Director of operations BBS Media described the Kano State governor as a “goof smoker under the influence of alcohol”.

item.title: 7 things to avoid in order not to go broke in Lagos
item.description: The economy is not smiling; everyone is living an uptight life right now. We need not remind you that things are three times their normal prices and living in a major city like Lagos is taking its toll on people. While the idea of returning to the village would strike many as unacceptable or disgraceful, the village might actually help you save more as the cost of living there is relatively low.

item.title: April 18 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: There are many challenges in finding the perfect career, but you are fortunate enough to have a well of potential careers to explore. Intellectual pursuits could lead you to the field of Law, which was the path of Clarence Darrow, who was also born on April 18th. In the same sense, as a natural leader, you could do well in business, sales, advertising or commerce. On the other hand, you may enjoy bringing your charisma to the world of media and journalism, much like Conan O'Brien, who was also born on April 18th.

item.title: Fox News Tricked Into Writing Gamestop Story Without Fact Checking
